events.message: I recently bought a jacket from your store, but it's the wrong size. I would like to return it and get a refund as soon as possible.
System identified the case as a refund request based on customer mentioning return and refund.
The case has been assigned to a customer support agent specializing in returns and refunds.
Hello! Thank you for contacting us. I’m here to assist you with the return process for your jacket.
Could you please provide your order number and confirm whether the jacket is unused and in original packaging?
Sure, my order number is 123456789. The jacket is brand new, still in the plastic wrapping it came with.
Thank you for the details. I’ve initiated the refund process for your order. Please use the prepaid return label attached to your email to send the jacket back.
Thanks for the quick help! I appreciate the prepaid label, that makes returning the jacket really easy.
Your refund case is now open and will be processed once we receive the returned jacket. You will be notified by email when the refund is completed.
Just checking in to confirm we have received your returned jacket. Your refund is being processed and should appear in your account shortly.
Your refund has been issued successfully, and your case is now closed. Please contact us if you have any further questions.
We’ve sent you a customer satisfaction survey. Please take a moment to share your feedback about your refund experience.
The customer completed the survey, rating the refund process as very satisfactory and the support as helpful and friendly.
The support case has been archived in the system following successful resolution and survey completion.
